name: BOOMLeaderFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This is an opportunity to be inspired by BOOMLeader, Tom Webb, to support you in becoming the best version of yourself and challenge your mindset for continued growth as a leader. Tom is a husband, father, educational speaker, leadership coach, and school principal. He has a passion for leading people to become the best version of themselves to find happiness in their careers and personal lives. This 60 second, daily flash briefing will inform, inspire, and motivate you to take the next step in this amazing journey of life. It's time to team up and jump on the bus because this field trip is set to depart. Let's GO!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
